name: Multidimensional Birb Syndrome
description:
A game played on many windows at once. Get birb to the end of the level, but know that one birb does not see everything. Combine what you can see in all windows, to finish the game! 

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • "B" to go back a level
  • CTRL to jump

TO PLAY DOWNLOAD ZIP FILE OR ALL 3 EXE FILES!
